Pre-Game Insights: Experts may favor Burkina Faso due to their past victories against Malawi
Patrick Mabedi, the Flames coach, emphasized the importance of a positive result against Burkina Faso to regain fan support
Others: The match is scheduled to take place at Stade du 26 Mars, in Bamako, Mali
Both teams are aiming for their first victory in the 2025 Afcon qualifiers after dropping points in their respective opening matches
The Flames started the 2025 Afcon qualifiers with a surprise 3-2 defeat to Burundi
The Stallions held Senegal to a 1-1 draw in Daka, Senegal
